definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: Article 20 A labor dispute arbitration commission shall have a roster of arbitrators.
sentences.chinese: 第二十条劳动争议仲裁委员会应当设仲裁员名册。

sentences.english: An arbitration commission shall have a register of arbitrators in different specializations.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁委员会按照不同专业设仲裁员名册。

sentences.english: How many names are there on your books?
sentences.chinese: 你们的登记名册上共有多少人？

sentences.english: Checking the sum of people on the farm I called the roll under the palm.
sentences.chinese: 我核查农场的人总共多少号，在棕榈树下按名册叫。

sentences.english: And it’s a fairly safe bet that the roster will grow even longer this year.
sentences.chinese: 我敢打赌，今年俱乐部的花名册将会变得更长。

sentences.english: It shall set up a roll of workers for reference.
sentences.chinese: 用人单位应当建立职工名册备查。

sentences.english: The hypothecation contract goes into effect as of the date the hypothecated shares are recorded in the stock ledger.
sentences.chinese: 质押合同自股份出质记载于股东名册之日起生效。

sentences.english: A project sign-up sheet will be circulated on the first class.
sentences.chinese: 一个签名册在第一堂课上将开始使用。

sentences.english: John doesn't think they have a deep enough pitching roster.
sentences.chinese: 约翰认为他们没有一个充足的铺地石名册。

sentences.english: A specialized farmers cooperative shall have a membership roll and file it with the registration authority.
sentences.chinese: 农民专业合作社应当置备成员名册，并报登记机关。

sentences.english: Burma Army's IB 21 remains just the name with no soldiers, La Nan added.
sentences.chinese: 战斗结束，缅军步21营仅留下名册，已无士兵。

sentences.english: The government accepted the opposition's demand for a new electoral register.
sentences.chinese: 政府接受了反对党提出的新的选民名册。

sentences.english: His name is Zhong Yong, which is recorded on the registration book.
sentences.chinese: 他的花名叫张永，这是记载在花名册上的。

sentences.english: From Conference pre-Registration list, none from China.
sentences.chinese: 翻查预登记名册，没有国内用户列表。

sentences.english: Supervisors' roster and minutes of supervisors' meeting.
sentences.chinese: 七监察人名册及监察人会议纪录。

sentences.english: The arbitration commission shall establish a list of arbitrators according to different professionals.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁委员会按照不同专业设仲裁员名册。
